overview: Don, his wife Heather and his son Chad get an unexpected visit from Don's ex-wife - Theresa, and her step-daughter Camille. Don and Heather have an open marriage. It's sure fun watching all those openings getting filled! Starring the sensational Katie Morgan as Theresa (yes, that Katie Morgan!!), gorgeous Mercedes Carrera as Heather, sensuous Leah Gotti as Camille, young and nimble Molly Manson as Don's client, Steven St. Croix as Don, Logan Pierce as Chad and Seth Gamble as a very hands-on masseur.
title: Forbidden Affairs 6: My Ex-Wife's Daughter
